effect.short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target and a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a separate 10% chance to make the target flinch.

flavorTexts.text:
The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. This may
also make the target flinch or leave it with a burn.
